posts.text:
BenQ GL2450
Er með Þennan flotta 24" BenQ skjá, lítið notaður, Kemur í kassanum með öllu. 
Hann er keyptur í tölvutek fyrir sirka hálfu ári.
Verð: SELDUR
BenQ GL2450: Specs
    Size: 24in
    Visible screen diagonal (cm): 61.0
    Panel technology: TN
    Aspect ratio: 16:9
    Screen finish: matt
    Resolution (pixel): 1920 x 1080
    Pixel density (ppi): 92
    Measure checkerboard contrast ratio: 610
    Measured maximum brightness (cd/m2): 261
    sRGB gamut (%): 99
    Adobe RGB gamut (%): 77
    Colour accuracy avg (delta-E): 1.57
    Stand Tilt: -5/15 degrees
    Video Inputs: VGA, DVI-D
    Connector orientation: vertical
    USB: N
    Speakers, amp: None
    Audio inputs: None
    Other features: internal PSU
    Overall size (whd): 579 x 436 x 179
    Power consumption max/120 cd/m^2 (watt): 21 / 12
    Bezel type: Thick Bezel
    Cable management: N
    Button type: push-buttons
    Rated response time: 2 ms GtG
    Rated viewing angles H/V: 170 / 160
    VESA mount: VESA 100
    Weight: 4.1 kg
